idea-plugin.name: Toggle Tabs - Swap Splits
idea-plugin.description:
Per-Split Tab History Navigation

Navigate your editor tabs smarter with per-split history tracking. Each split pane maintains its own independent navigation history, so you can jump back and forth within a single split without affecting your other splits.

Features

  • XToggle - Alternates between back and forward navigation. Press once to go back, press again to go forward. Perfect for quick A/B comparisons between files.
  • XBack - Navigate backward in the current split's history
  • XForward - Navigate forward in the current split's history
  • XSwap - Swap the current tab between split panes. Moves your current file to the next split and brings the other file here.

Why Per-Split History?

The built-in IDE back/forward navigation is global - it jumps across all splits, which can be disorienting when working with multiple files side-by-side. This plugin tracks history per split pane, making navigation predictable and efficient.

Quick Start

  1. Open Settings â†’ Keymap
  2. Search for "XToggle", "XBack", "XForward", or "XSwap"
  3. Assign your preferred keyboard shortcuts

All actions start with 'X' to make them easy to find in the keymap search.
